title: Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a skilled frontend developer with experience in React.js and modern CSS. You'll be responsible for building user interfaces and implementing design systems. Requirements: 3+ years of experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and at least 1 year with React.

title: UX Designer
description: Design beautiful interfaces and delightful user experiences. You'll work closely with product managers and engineers to create intuitive and accessible designs. Requirements: Portfolio demonstrating UX/UI skills, experience with Figma or Sketch, 2+ years of design experience.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Build and maintain our server infrastructure and APIs. You'll work with Node.js, Python, and various databases to create scalable backend systems. Requirements: Strong knowledge of server-side technologies, experience with cloud platforms, 3+ years of backend development.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Lead our marketing efforts and develop strategies to grow our brand. You'll manage campaigns, analyze metrics, and work with creative teams. Requirements: 5+ years of marketing experience, strong analytical skills, experience with digital marketing tools.

title: Sales Representative
description: Build relationships with clients and drive sales growth. You'll identify new business opportunities and manage existing accounts. Requirements: Excellent communication skills, 2+ years of sales experience, ability to travel occasionally.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement and maintain our CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. You'll work with Docker, Kubernetes, and various cloud providers to ensure reliable deployments. Requirements: Experience with infrastructure as code, monitoring tools, and automation.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product development from conception to launch. You'll gather requirements, prioritize features, and work with cross-functional teams. Requirements: 3+ years of product management experience, technical background preferred, strong organizational skills.
